trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of items.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于呈现的项的集合的控件。

trans-unit.source: An ItemsControl is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> that can contain multiple items, such as strings, objects, or other elements.
trans-unit.target: ItemsControl 是一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>，可以包含多个项，例如字符串、 对象或其他元素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control that contains the following different types of items: - A string.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>包含以下不同类型的项的控件:-string。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.DateTime>对象。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>对象。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> control that contains an <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock></xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>的控件</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: ![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") ListBox that contains multiple types of objects Use either the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property to specify the collection to use to generate the content of your ItemsControl.
trans-unit.target: ![使用四种类型的内容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "与四种类型的内容的 ListBox")列表框中包含多个类型的对象使用两种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>属性来指定要用于生成你 ItemsControl 的内容的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property to any type that implements <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>为实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>任何类型的属性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> is typically used to display a data collection or to bind an ItemsControl to a collection object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>通常用于显示一个数据集合，或将 ItemsControl 绑定到集合对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to use an object that implements <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> to populate the ItemsControl, you can add items by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要使用的对象实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>来填充 ItemsControl，可以添加项使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The items in an ItemsControl can have different types.
trans-unit.target: ItemsControl 中的项可以具有不同的类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> can contain one item that is a string and another item that is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>只能包含一个项目是一个字符串和即<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>的另一个项</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection is set to read-only and fixed-size.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>集合设置为只读和固定大小。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that you cannot add items to the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，你无法将项添加到集合直接。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>, which will be an empty <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>正在使用，将属性设置为`null`移除集合并到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>，这将是一个空<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>恢复使用</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each ItemsControl type has a corresponding item container type.
trans-unit.target: 每个 ItemsControl 类型具有相应的项容器类型。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding item container for each ItemsControl appends `Item` to its name.
trans-unit.target: 每个 ItemsControl 的对应项容器追加`Item`为其名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the item containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，项容器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控件; 有关<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，它们是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can explicitly create a container type for each item in the ItemsControl, but it is not necessary.
trans-unit.target: ItemsControl，在显式创建每个项的容器类型，但不需要。

trans-unit.source: When you do not explicitly create the container type, one is generated that contains a data item in the item collection.
trans-unit.target: 当未显式创建的容器类型时，将生成一个包含项集合中的数据项目。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you bind a collection of string objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, you do not explicitly create <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> objects, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> will generate one for each string.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果将绑定到字符串对象的集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，未显式创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>对象，但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>将生成一个用于每个字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access a generated item container by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用访问生成的项容器<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Certain features of UI Automation do not work correctly when an ItemsControl contains duplicate objects.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> UI 自动化的某些功能无法正常工作时 ItemsControl 包含重复的对象。

trans-unit.source: If an object appears multiple times, only the first instance appears in the automation tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象在出现多次，仅第一个实例将出现在自动化树中。

trans-unit.source: (Two objects **x** and **y** are considered to be duplicates if `Object.Equals(x, y)` returns `true`.) > > While an object **x** is in use by an ItemsControl the value returned by **x.**`GetHashCode()`
trans-unit.target: (两个对象**x**和**y**被视为重复如果`Object.Equals(x, y)`返回`true`。) >> 而对象**x**正在 ItemsControl 使用返回的值**x。**`GetHashCode()`

trans-unit.source: must not change.
trans-unit.target: 不得更改。

trans-unit.source: Changes to this value are unsupported, and lead to unpredictable behavior.
trans-unit.target: 对此值进行更改不受支持，并可能导致不可预知的行为。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified object as the child of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的对象添加为的子<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 要作为子级添加的对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified text string to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到指定的文本字符串<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The string to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of alternating item containers in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>, which enables alternating containers to have a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置交替项中的容器的数量<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>，可使交替容器具有唯一外观。

trans-unit.source: The AlternationCount and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating item containers.
trans-unit.target: AlternationCount 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使您能够指定两个或多个交替项容器的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third item in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>中指定的每个第三个项的交替的背景色

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is assigned to each item container in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>分配给每个项容器中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> begins at 0, increments until it is AlternationCount minus 1, and then restarts at 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>从 0 开始的直到 AlternationCount 减 1，并在 0 然后重新启动的增量。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if AlternationCount is 3 and there are seven items in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, the following table lists the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for each item.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 AlternationCount 为 3 中的七项<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>下, 表列出<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>每个项。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: One method is to bind properties of the items container to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 一种方法是将项容器的属性绑定到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then use an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> to specify which value should be applied to the item container that has a certain <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>来指定应将哪个值应用到具有特定的项容器<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>

trans-unit.source: You can also use triggers to change the value of an item container's property depending on the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以使用触发器若要更改根据其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的值的项容器的属性的值

trans-unit.source: The number of alternating item containers in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 交替项中的容器的数量<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值在要充当的可视表示形式的对象的源对象上的路径。

trans-unit.target: 此属性是一种简单的方法来定义的默认模板，介绍如何显示数据对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle"></xref> objects that define the appearance of each level of groups.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle"></xref>定义每个级别的组的外观的对象。

trans-unit.source: The entry at index 0 describes the top-level groups, the entry at index 1 describes the next level, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 索引 0 处的项描述顶级组，索引 1 处的项描述下一个级别，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: If there are more levels of grouping than entries in the collection, the last entry is used for the extra levels.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在于集合中的项的更多级别的分组，最后一项适用于的额外级别。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether case is a condition when searching for items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示搜索项时大小写是否为条件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, the IsTextSearchCaseSensitive property specifies whether the case determines whether an item is selected in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchEnabled%2A>属性设置为`true`，IsTextSearchCaseSensitive 属性指定是否这种情况可确定是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>中选择一项</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> contain two strings that differ only in case, such as "ITEM" and "item", the first string will always be selected, regardless of the case of the input.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>包含仅在大小写不同，如"项目"和"item"，第一个字符串始终会选择，无论输入的大小写的两个字符串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if text searches are case-sensitive; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果文本搜索区分大小写;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> that is copied to each item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>复制到的每一项<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you set the ItemBindingGroup property, each item container gets a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> that has the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> objects as the ItemBindingGroup, but the properties that describe the data in the bindings, such as <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A>, are specific to the data for each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 每个项目容器时设置 ItemBindingGroup 属性，获取<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>具有相同的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>对象作为 ItemBindingGroup，但用于描述中的绑定，如<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A>、 特定于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>中每一项数据</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A></xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>的数据的属性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule></xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>

trans-unit.source: You must access the item container's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A> to perform operations such as validate the data and check for errors on an item.
trans-unit.target: 你必须访问项容器的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A>执行操作，如验证数据和错误检查的项。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"></xref> that is associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"></xref>控件与该键相关联。

trans-unit.source: An ItemContainerGenerator is responsible for generating the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] for its host, such as an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: ItemContainerGenerator 负责生成[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]对于其主机，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: It maintains the association between the items in the data view of the control and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: 这样可保持该控件的数据视图中的项和相应之间的关联<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>对象。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> has an associated item container that contains a data item in the item collection.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>具有关联的项的容器，其中包含的项集合中的数据项。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: You can use the ItemContainerGenerator property to access the item container that is associated with your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 ItemContainerGenerator 属性访问与你<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>关联项容器

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control and you want to get a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> based on its index or its associated data item, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有一个数据绑定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>控件，并且想要获取<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>基于其索引或其关联的数据项，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.IndexFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get the index or data item that is associated with a given generated container element.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.IndexFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法以获取与给定的所生成的容器元素关联的索引或数据项。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.IndexFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IItemContainerGenerator> interface is also used in advanced scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IItemContainerGenerator>接口还用于在高级方案中。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IItemContainerGenerator>

trans-unit.source: Typically, advanced applications that have their own implementation of a virtualizing panel call members of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，具有自己的虚拟化的面板的实现的高级应用程序调用该接口的成员。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"></xref> that is associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"> </xref>控件与该键相关联。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> that is applied to the container element generated for each item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> ，应用于为每个项生成的容器元素。

trans-unit.source: You use this property or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A> property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>属性来设置样式，以影响包含数据项的元素的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the generated containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，生成的容器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控件; 有关<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，它们是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>Visual 自定义项中提供极大的灵活性，并提供许多样式和模板化的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: To affect the layout of the items, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要影响的项的布局，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的对控件的分组，则可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the visualization of data objects, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的数据对象的可视化效果，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about when to specify an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关何时指定详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties.

trans-unit.source: A common scenario is to use an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> to display a data collection, or to bind an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> to a collection object.

trans-unit.target: 若要将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>到集合对象，使用 ItemsSource 属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: Note that the ItemsSource property supports <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> binding by default.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，ItemsSource 属性支持<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>默认绑定。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>

trans-unit.source: When the ItemsSource property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection is made read-only and fixed-size.
trans-unit.target: 当设置 ItemsSource 属性时，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>集合写入只读的和更改的固定大小。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: When ItemsSource is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>, which will be an empty <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ItemsSource 时，将属性设置为`null`移除集合并到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>，这将是一个空<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>恢复使用

trans-unit.source: When ItemsSource is not in use, the value of this property is `null`, and setting it to `null` has no effect.
trans-unit.target: ItemsSource 不使用时，此属性的值是`null`，并将它设置为`null`不起作用。

trans-unit.source: When you set an ItemTemplate on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is generated as follows (using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> as an example): 1.
trans-unit.target: 当上设置 ItemTemplate <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>、 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ，如下所示生成 (使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>作为示例): 1。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: During content generation, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> initiates a request for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A> to create a container for each data item.
trans-unit.target: 在内容生成过程<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>启动请求<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A>创建每个数据项的容器。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the container is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>容器是一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> 、

trans-unit.source: The generator calls back into the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> to prepare the container.
trans-unit.target: 生成器回调到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>以准备该容器。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: Part of the preparation involves the copying of the ItemTemplate of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to be the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.
trans-unit.target: 准备工作的一部分涉及到复制的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> ItemTemplate

trans-unit.source: Similar to all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> types, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>.
trans-unit.target: 类似于所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>类型，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>包含一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>的</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: When the template is applied, it creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> whose <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> is bound to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.
trans-unit.target: 当应用该模板时，它将创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>绑定到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> applies that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> to itself, and that creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 最后，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>适用的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>到其自身，并创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> defined and you want to supply logic to programmatically choose and apply a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有多个<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>定义，并且你想要提供逻辑来以编程方式选择并应用<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>Visual 自定义项中提供极大的灵活性，并提供许多样式和模板化的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A> property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>属性或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>属性来设置样式，以影响包含数据项的元素的外观。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the generated containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，生成的容器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控件; 有关<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，它们是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: To affect the layout of the items, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要影响的项的布局，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的对控件的分组，则可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>
